data.text: Alatala to Dawuda ratanga Sɔlu nun a yaxuie ma, Dawuda naxa yi bɛɛti ba Alatala bɛ.
A naxɛ,
N Marigi Ala luxi alɔ gɛmɛ yire
Ala tantu!
Faxɛ nu bara wa nɔfe n na,
faxɛ luuti nu bara n xiri,
N ma tɔɔrɛ kui, n bara Alatala xili,
Awa, koore nun bɔxi naxa imaxa,
Tuuri nu minima a ɲɔɛ i,
A naxa koore walaxɛ ɲɛnkɛn,
A naxa ti malekɛ fari,
Nuxui ifɔɔrɔxie nu na a rabilinyi,
Tɛ wolee nu minima a xa yanbɛ ya ra.
Alatala xui nu luxi alɔ se sarinyi.
A naxa seyamakɔnyie woli alɔ xalie,
Baa bunyi naxa maba,
A naxa a bɛlɛxɛ itala keli koore ma,
A naxa n natanga n yaxui sɛnbɛmae ma,
E nu n gerema n xunsin lɔxɔɛe kui,
A naxa n namini,
Alatala n suxu n ma tinxinyi nan ma,
barima n nu ɲɛrɛma Alatala xa kira nan xɔn,
N birama a xa yaamarie fɔxɔ ra,
N tinxin nɛ a bɛ,
Na kui Alatala naxa n ma tinxinyi
Mixi naxan tima i sɛɛti ma,
Mixi naxan sɛniyɛn i ya xɔri,
I mixi magoroxie itema nɛ,
I tan Alatala nan na n ma naiyalanyi ra.
Xa i na n fɔxɔ ra,
Ala xa kira kamalixi.
Nde na Ala ra xa Alatala mu a ra?
Ala nan na n ma yire makantaxi ra,
A n malima n ma ɲɛrɛ kui,
A n malima n ma gere kui,
I findixi n ma kantama nan na,
I n naɲɛrɛma a fanyi ra,
N na n yaxuie kerima, n e sɔntɔma.
N e faxama nɛ, n e bɔnbɔma nɛ.
I sɛnbɛ fima n ma gere kui,
I n yaxuie kerima n ya ra,
E e ya ragema nɛ, kɔnɔ e rakisima mu na!
N e luntunma nɛ e findi xube ra,
I bara n natanga n ma ɲama xa ɲɔxɔnsɔsɔɛ ma,
Si gbɛtɛe n matɔxɔma,
Si gbɛtɛe mu suusama sɔnɔn,
Kisi na Alatala bɛ,
Tantui na Ala bɛ,
naxan n bama n yaxuie yi ra,
Na nan a ra, n i matɔxɔma sie tagi, Alatala!
A bara a xa mangɛ sugandixi rakisi,
